Description: 6 beads in different shape and material. A: Two cylindrical segmented beads made of faience, no glaze preserve. B: One ring-shaped bead made of bluish paste. C: Half of a barrel-shaped bead made of white faience. D: Two disc-shaped beads, one small one made of white faience, one large one made of ostrich eggshell, roughly shaped.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2Y, level 1, wall
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
